Row.Text: +1 [ICON_RESEARCH] Research for forest or jungles and +1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness for each Garden.
Allows the construction of the Inquisiton building. +5[ICON_PEACE] Faith and a free inquisitor.
Allows the construction of the Nature Gods building, +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and +2 [ICON_PEACE] Faith per mountain and natural wonders.
+2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for each Great Person improvement.
+2 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science for each Great Person improvement.
+2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for each Great Person improvement
+2 [ICON_FOOD] Food for each Great Person improvement.
+2 [ICON_PEACE] Faith for each Great Person improvement.
+2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production for each Great Person improvement.
Construct the Religious School, +3 [ICON_PEACE] Faith, +1 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science and +1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness.
Gain [ICON_PEACE] Faith each time you kill a enemy 8 tiles from your cities, -25% [ICON_STRENGTH] Strength from other religions.
+1 Tourism frome each building purchased by [ICON_PEACE] Faith.
+1[ICON_GOLD] Gold for each [ICON_CITIZEN] follower and +3[ICON_PEACE] Faith for each Bank.
Buy all [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Persons with [ICON_PEACE] Faith.
+100 [ICON_PEACE] Faith when a [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Person was expanded.
+10% more [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production when construction of Wonders.
+20 religious spreading and +50% fo friendly Citystates.
+10 [ICON_CULTURE] Culturebonus in all of your cities.
Gain [ICON_PEACE] Faith each time one of your units died.
Gain [ICON_PEACE] Faith each time you kill a enemy unit.
+1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for each 3 [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizen following this Religion.
+5 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for each city following this Religion.
+1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness for each city following this Religion.
Allowes the construction of the Mammon temple.
+1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness for each 10 [ICON_CITIZEN] follower in foreign cities, Temple of Ishtar.
+Gain +100 [ICON_PEACE] Faith each time a [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Person was expanded.
+10% [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength near Cities that follow this Religion. Buy military units till medieval.
+5 [ICON_PEACE] Faith for each of your Cities with at least 5 [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizen.
+10% [ICON_CULTURE] Culture in all of your Cities.
+1 [ICON_FOOD] Food for each Forest and Jungle and adds +2 yields + [ICON_FOOD] Food for each Garden you own.
+3 [ICON_PEACE] Faith ,+1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] und + 15 Gold [ICON_GOLD] each time a Great Person is expanded.
+1 [ICON_HAPPINESS] Happiness for each 10 [ICON_CITIZEN] follower in foreign Cities and +100% spread to friendly City States.
Religion spreads 25% faster and +1% [ICON_RESEARCH] Science per follower (up to 10).
+1[ICON_FOOD] Food and +1[ICON_PEACE] Faith from snow tiles.
Prophets spreads Religion with double [ICON_STRENGTH] Strength.
+250 [ICON_GOLD] Gold when converting a City the first time.
+1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happines and Tourism fror each Castle.
+2[ICON_PEACE] Faith, +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and +10% [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great People in this City.
+1[ICON_PEACE] Faith from Coast/Atoll tiles and Fishing Boats
+1[ICON_PEACE] Faith for each Farm and Granary.
+1% [ICON_Gold] for each follower in this City (up to 25).
+1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness and +15% [ICON_FOOD] Food in each City.
+1 [ICON_PEACE] Faith for every Landtile worked by a City you own.
+1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness for each 3 followers in foreign contries and +5[ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Culture for each Tradingroute.
+50% [ICON_STRENGTH] Rangestrentgh for Cities and +25% Healrate for friendly units in your terrain.
Provides +1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness for each World Wonder you own.
Provides +1 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism for each World Wonder you own.
Provides +2 yield [ICON_PEACE] Faith for each luxury resource worked by one of your cities.
Provides +1 yield [ICON_PEACE] Faith and [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production for each strategic resource worked by one of your cities.
Provides +1 yield [ICON_PEACE] Faith for each bonus resource worked by one of your cities.
